mapper.select: SELECT er.id, er.exercise_id, e.name AS exercise_name, e.met, e.intensity_level, e.type, er.record_date, er.duration_minutes, er.calories FROM exercise_records er JOIN exercises e ON er.exercise_id = e.id WHERE er.id = #{recordId} AND er.email = #{email}

SELECT er.id, er.exercise_id, e.name AS exercise_name, e.met, e.intensity_level, e.type, er.record_date, er.duration_minutes, er.calories FROM exercise_records er JOIN exercises e ON er.exercise_id = e.id WHERE er.email = #{email} AND er.record_date = #{recordDate} ORDER BY er.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise_records (email, exercise_id, record_date, duration_minutes, calories) VALUES (#{email}, #{exerciseId}, #{recordDate}, #{durationMinutes}, #{calories})
